field.name: hometeamID
field.label: COM_CLUBMANAGER_FIELD_HOMETEAMID_LABEL
field.query: SELECT groupID AS value, groupname AS hometeamID FROM #__cmgroup

field.name: awayteamID
field.label: COM_CLUBMANAGER_FILED_AWAYTEAMID_LABEL
field.query: SELECT groupID AS value, groupname AS awayteamID FROM #__cmgroup
